1�I am sure that you will find them most useful.

1�I had concealed my presence, but sensed a chill in the air.
1�Then I noticed you on the deck, with some rather unfriendly company.
1�I must admit to my surprise.
1�But it is good to see another Sentinel who shares my instincts.
1�The being that gave the orders...
1�His supernatural aura was palpable.
1�We can assume he is the captain of the ship.
1�If we can but uncover the true identity of that apparition, the secrets of the ghost ship will be ours.
